Author: nontanu
Text: I've had binges far worse than 500 calories and I know how you feel. If it helps, I'm also 5'7, but 6 pounds heavier and 8 years older. Hang in there.

Author: TotallyNotARadar
Text: I was in just the same spot a month or so ago. It was 2am, I just turned in an essay due at midnight (it be like that sometimes) and I decided to reward myself with a few mini marshmallows. I had one, then two, then took out my phone and started checking instagram or whatever, and then suddenly I ate half the bag. I don't purge but I was on the verge of puking just from the physical damage of consuming so many marshmallows. Don't recommend it, but you can survive it.
